award_title: RUI: Investigating ATP's Influence on Ferritin Structure, Function, and Cellular Iron Homeostasis
subject: re: deep learning + ferritin structural analysis
body:
Hi Fadi,

I'm working on computational reproducibility in biophysics. Saw you're using deep learning methods for ferritin structure analysisâ€”I've hit the same wall where publishing a computational method doesn't mean anyone can actually run it again.

Built something called Ouro that might help. It provides a thin API layer over computational workflows, letting other researchers reuse methods directly instead of recreating them from papers.

Figured it might be useful for the structural biology + ML parts of your iron homeostasis work.

Let me know if you'd like to poke around.

Best,

Matt
Founder
https://ouro.foundation
